thread.title_full: Mahagun Meadows a new project of Mahagun Group (Shiwangi Singh)

title: Mahagun Meadows a new project of Mahagun Group (Shiwangi Singh)
text: By Shiwangi Singh Sep 30, 2015 Mahagun Meadows is new residential township being developed by the premium real estate group. The complex has been integrated with a Golf course and is ranked as one of the best residential complexes in Delhi NCR. Mahagun Meadows is located at Sector 150 Noida and thus offers major location advantages. The complex is near to major social infrastructures and road networks like Yamuna Expressway, DND Flyway and FNG Expressway. Mahagun Meadows Noida offers quite an exciting range of 2BHK, 3BHK, 4BHK and 5BHK apartments and villas in size range of 1425 square feet and 4900 square feet. Mahagun Meadows Noida is built exquisitely with its designing done by world famous architect, Hafeez Contractor while landscaping design executed by popular Sanju Bose. The township fully adheres to norms of Vaastu and Feng Shui design and layout. This promises quality of life in addition to unparalleled living experience. Mahagun Meadows Sector 150 Noida is home to exciting floor plans which include 2BHK flats in Noida at the complex in size like 1425 square feet and 1465 square feet. The 3 BHK residential units at Mahagun Meadows Noida are offered in sizes such as 1760 square feet, 1945 square feet, 2385 square feet and 2700 square feet. The spacious 4BHK apartments at Mahagun Meadows are available in sizes like 2950 square feet and 3400 square feet. Mahgaun Meadows also brings to homebuyers a wonderful opportunity to invest in king-styled, luxurious 5BHK villas offered in size of 4900 square feet. The complex has been built using strong RCC framework which ensures earthquake resistance, safeguarding occupants at all times. The compound has been pre-certified with gold standard of Indian Green Building Council and follows many different green ways of construction and infrastructure development. It has integrated energy efficient appliances and makes use of recycled water for horticulture and in flush tanks. Mahagun Meadows even renders an electrical charging facility to encourage the use of electrical vehicles by residents. Mahagun Meadows Sector 150, Noida offers a plethora of basic and modern facilities that fully compliments its beautifully planned summer and winter landscapes. There is reduced vehicular traffic on surface at Mahagun Meadows. The complex has a clubhouse featuring opulent amenities like lounge, library, table tennis, gym and indoor game room. The township even offers jogging track, cycling track, multi-purpose court, skating facility, nature walk and much more. Mahagun Group is a conglomerate of different companies working the field of real estate development. The group owns a rich experience in development of both residential as well as commercial properties across India and has a strong presence in Delhi NCR. The group houses a large team of experts and professionals aptly skilled in creation of quality real estate products. Click : http://www.mahagunmeadows.co.in
